title: Creamy chorizo and tomato pasta
ingredients: ['150g penne, fusilli or farfalle pasta', '2 rashers smoked streaky bacon, chopped', '1 small onion, chopped finely', '1 teaspoon olive oil', '100-120g chorizo sausage, cut into 1cm thick slices', '1 small garlic clove, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 tablespoon sun-dried tomato pesto', '200ml cream', 'salt and pepper to taste', '8 tablespoons freshly grated Parmesan cheese']
